issue.title: Low frame rates from MultisenseSL cameras in VRC Task1

content.raw: I've since tested on a GTX 660 and 660 Ti, neither being able to provide higher frame rates. What driver are you using for your 680 and have you done any types of optimization (custom firmwares etc.) to improve performance? I'm also assuming you're running on Ubuntu 12.04 or 12.10.
content.html: I've since tested on a GTX 660 and 660 Ti, neither being able to provide higher frame rates. What driver are you using for your 680 and have you done any types of optimization (custom firmwares etc.) to improve performance? I'm also assuming you're running on Ubuntu 12.04 or 12.10.
